Title: Relates to establishing cryptocurrencies as a form of payment for state agencies
Summary: Establishes that state agencies are allowed to accept cryptocurrencies such as bitcoin, ethereum, litecoin and bitcoin cash as payment.
LawCode: Add ยง4-b, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to allowing New York state agencies to accept cryptocurrencies as a form of payment
